Player History

Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1980, winning 2 games with a 0.56 ERA...

Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1980, going 14-15, 3.34 ERA...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...

Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/28/1984 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...

Won World Series with New York (N) in 1985...
Injured on 10/8/1986 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Philadelphia on 4/6/1987, striking out 6...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1987, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1987, going 6-0, 1.42...

Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
